dict.string: Now you will create a passcode to identify yourself to the app and protect access to information you've entered.
Thank you for joining this study.
Please try again in five minutes.

You have the option to contribute your health-related data so that researchers can better study the long-term effects of COVID-19. All data will be kept completely confidential, and any identifiers will be removed before being shared with researchers.
You have the option to share your health records with the research team, such as your health history or medications. The records shared will help us to study the long-term effects of COVID-19.
Sign in using your Apple ID is fast and easy, and Apple will not track any of your activities.
We need to confirm your email address and send you a copy of the consent you just signed.
Are you sure you want to withdraw?
Withdrawing from the study will reset the app to the state it was in prior to you originally joining the study.
Thank you for your contribution to this study. We are sorry that you could not continue. The app will now close.

This platform was developed to help COVID-19 patients monitor their health following diagnosis while also providing researchers and clinicians the tools to improve the understanding of long-term physical and psychosocial effects of the disease.

This platform was developed to help COVID-19 patients monitor their health following diagnosis while also providing researchers and clinicians the tools to improve the understanding of long-term physical and psychosocial effects of the disease.
The platform only collects information that you provide via in-app surveys. Examples of collected information include information that you share in your user profile and answers on symptom surveys.
The platform only collects information that you provide via in-app surveys. Examples of collected information include information that you share in your user profile and answers on symptom surveys.
We respect the privacy of our users, all data is kept private and confidential. Please see our privacy policy for more details.
We respect the privacy of our users, all data is kept private and confidential. Please see our privacy policy for more details.
Your data will be used stored securely and used for research purposes only. Your data will not be shared outside of our research team.
Your data will be used stored securely and used for research purposes only. Your data will not be shared outside of our research team.

This study includes an initial survey that will take you less than 5 minutes to complete. After this, we will ask you to update your symptoms and health questionnaires weekly. Weekly surveys should take less than 5 minutes to complete.

This study includes an initial survey that will take you less than 5 minutes to complete. After this, we will ask you to update your symptoms and health questionnaires weekly. Weekly surveys should take less than 5 minutes to complete.

You will complete weekly surveys on your general health and functioning as well as any symptoms you may be experiencing. This information will be used to help you monitor your health, and will help researchers better understand the long-term physical and psychosocial effects of COVID-19.

You will complete weekly surveys on your general health and functioning as well as any symptoms you may be experiencing. This information will be used to help you monitor your health, and will help researchers better understand the long-term physical and psychosocial effects of COVID-19. Please contact your medical provider if you are experiencing worsening COVID-19 symptoms.

You participation is voluntary, and you may withdraw at any time. You will be asked to complete a brief questionnaire if you choose to withdraw to deteremine your reason for withdrawing and to determine the appropriate data usage.

You participation is voluntary, and you may withdraw at any time. You will be asked to complete a brief questionnaire if you choose to withdraw to deteremine your reason for withdrawing and to determine the appropriate data usage.

This platform allows you to monitor your health following a diagnosis of COVID-19. With your permission, your data will provide researchers and clinicians the tools to better understand the long-term effects of the disease.
Little is known about the long-term implications of COVID-19. You can contribute your data to help researchers understand the ongoing physical and psychosocial effects.
You'll be asked to track any symptoms you're experiencing and complete short surveys. You'll also be able to access regularly updated resources and connect with members of your care team.
